body_text: This isn't correct. The comparator function passed to .sort() should return -1, 0, or 1, not a boolean. Assuming id is a number, a.get('id') - b.get('id') would would.
body: This isn't correct. The comparator function passed to `.sort()` [should return -1, 0, or 1](https://facebook.github.io/immutable-js/docs/#/Set/sort), not a boolean. Assuming `id` is a number, `a.get('id') - b.get('id')` would would.
body_html: This isn't correct. The comparator function passed to .sort() should return -1, 0, or 1, not a boolean. Assuming id is a number, a.get('id') - b.get('id') would would.
